attributes.action: Give Anthony Baldoni the right to sing and dance in White's Club,St James's and in any Conservative Club in mainland Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to have the right to sing and dance like Fred Astaire and not be subjected to eviction or a banning order or suspension from said club.  I appeal to the people and the P.M. to give me my democratic right without the fear of being shunned by the public or made to appear in front of the magistrates.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
